IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE STUDENTS IN GRADE 5 THROUGH GRADE 12 WITH AN ELEMENTARY AND/OR SECONDARY EDUCATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE PURPOSE OF THE WOOSTER SCHOOL IS TO PREPARE YOUNG PEOPLE FOR FULFILLMENT, HAPPINESS AND SUCCESS IN LIFE THROUGH THE RIGOROUS AND HEALTHY DEVELOPMENT OF INTELLECT, CONSCIENCE, BODY AND SPIRIT. THE WOOSTER SCHOOL COMMUNITY FOSTERS A CULTURE RICH IN THINKING, LEARNING, RELATIONSHIPS AND SELF-HELP. STUDENTS DEVELOP THE SKILLS, DISPOSITIONS AND KNOWLEDGE NECESSARY TO CONFIDENTLY AND RESILIENTLY ENGAGE THE WORLD AS PEOPLE OF CONSCIENCE, COMPASSION AND ACTION.
IRS990.Desc: INSTRUCTION OF AND EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS FOR APPROXIMATELY 317 CHILDREN ENROLLED IN GRADE 5 THROUGH GRADE 12 BY APPROXIMATELY 70 QUALIFIED INSTRUCTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FURTHERANCE OF THE ORGANIZATION'S EXEMPT PURPOSE AND DONOR STIPULATIONS.
NOTED IN GENERAL PUBLICATIONS AS WELL AS ON THE SCHOOL'S WEBSITE

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: REDUCTION OF TUITION COST CHARGED TO STUDENT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAINTAINS A LISTING OF ALL SCHOLARSHIP RECIPIENTS AND AMOUNTS AWARDED TO EACH STUDENT.
ON-CAMPUS HOUSING IS PROVIDED TO THE HEAD OF SCHOOL AS A CONDITION OF EMPLOYMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF SCHOOL AND AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEW AND APPROVE THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO THE FILING OF THE RETURN. IN ADDITION, THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE FULL BOARD FOR THEIR REVIEW PRIOR TO FILING THE RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, ALL BOARD MEMBERS AND TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS ARE REQUIRED TO FILL OUT A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. ALL POTENTIAL ISSUES ARE REVIEWED AND RESOLVED IMMEDIATELY BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DETERMINATION OF COMPENSATION FOR THE HEAD OF SCHOOL INCLUDED CONSIDERATION OF COMPARABILITY DATA FOR INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS BOTH NATIONALLY AND REGIONALLY, WITH SPECIFIC REFERENCE TO INSTITUTIONS OF COMPARABLE SIZE, SCOPE AND PROGRAMS. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE PROPOSES THE SALARY TO THE FULL BOARD FOR APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IT IS THE SCHOOL'S POLICY THAT NO DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UNLESS THE SPECIFIC REQUEST IS FIRST REVIEWED BY THE BOARD.
